unpublishedAction.name: get_all_invoices

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT created_at, id, invoice_number, client_name, trip_month, banner, status,
(total_price_after_vat_ait - received_amount) as total_receivable_with_vat_ait,
total_price_after_vat_ait as invoice_amount,
collectable as "net_to_redx(invoice_amount_wo_vat_ait)", 
received_amount as received_amount_w_vat_ait,
received_amount_wo_vat_ait,
shop_id, user_data,trip_counts,hard_copy_receiving_date,vat,received_vat_amount, ait, received_ait_amount,
hard_copy_of_bill,
replace(hard_copy_of_bill, '''','')::json->0 hard_copy 
FROM finance_trip_invoices 
where
{{isInvalidCheckBox.isChecked==true && isInvalidCheckBoxCopy.isChecked==true?
	"status in ('Invalid') and ((total_price_after_vat_ait - received_amount)<= 0 or status ='receiving-complete')":
isInvalidCheckBox.isChecked==true && isInvalidCheckBoxCopy.isChecked==false?
"status in ('Invalid') and (total_price_after_vat_ait != received_amount)" :
isInvalidCheckBox.isChecked==false && isInvalidCheckBoxCopy.isChecked==false?
	"status in ("+ ( "'"+ MultiSelect1.selectedOptionValues.join("','")+"'") + ") and (total_price_after_vat_ait != received_amount)":"status not in ('Invalid') and ((total_price_after_vat_ait - received_amount)<= 0 or status ='receiving-complete')"}}
and trip_month = '{{moment(DatePicker1.selectedDate).format("MMM-YY")}}'

invalids: 'Query timeout' field must be an integer between 0 and 60000
jsonPathKeys:
isInvalidCheckBox.isChecked==true && isInvalidCheckBoxCopy.isChecked==true?
	"status in ('Invalid') and ((total_price_after_vat_ait - received_amount)<= 0 or status ='receiving-complete')":
isInvalidCheckBox.isChecked==true && isInvalidCheckBoxCopy.isChecked==false?
"status in ('Invalid') and (total_price_after_vat_ait != received_amount)" :
isInvalidCheckBox.isChecked==false && isInvalidCheckBoxCopy.isChecked==false?
	"status in ("+ ( "'"+ MultiSelect1.selectedOptionValues.join("','")+"'") + ") and (total_price_after_vat_ait != received_amount)":"status not in ('Invalid') and ((total_price_after_vat_ait - received_amount)<= 0 or status ='receiving-complete')"
